The current version is *none*

Previous versions: none.




To use spann in a maven project, use the following settings

{{{
<repository>
  <id>spann</id>
  <url>repos</url>
</repository>

<depednency>
  <groupId>org.spann</groupId>
<!--  uncomment one.. -->
<!--  <artifactId>spann-metadata</artifactId> -->
<!--  <artifactId>spann-spring</artifactId> -->
<!--  <artifactId>spann-orm</artifactId> -->
  <version>0.1</version>
</dependency>

}}}

If using spann-metadata directly, you will also need to add an ASM implementation to your
project.
